item.title: Neil-isms
item.description: Neil-isms I’m not a parent and I’m not sure if I want kids, but I have this awesome image of myself as “your gender-neutral aunt linda”, and I’d like to have some sayings that I get to say all the time. I don’t want to fuck it up, so I’m preparing and curating a list. Your gender-netural aunt linda exits the room with; twitter bot incoming. We’re all teachers, but we can’t teach any one person everything and sometimes we can’t teach anyone anything.

item.title: What I've been reading Lately
item.description: Much like my advisor1, I’ve been trying to get back into reading books after a hiatus implicitly imposed by engineering and computer science curricula2, and then by being busy. A side effect of the double-whammy of quarantine and exploration of my gender expression/identity, however, is that I’ve had to cut pretty much everything that doesn’t give me space/energy/spoons during restful time so I don’t have a meltdown halfway through the week.
